titleStmt.title: Austins Vrania, or, The heauenly muse in a poem full of most feeling meditations for the comfort of all soules, at all times: by S.A. B. of Arts of Ex. Colledge in Oxford.
Urania
titleStmt.author: Austin, Samuel, b. 1605 or 6.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F[elix] K[ingston] for Robert Allot and Henry Seile,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page reading: Austins Vrania .. set forth in a poem containing two bookes.
The second book has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
